text:
Directory names with a '%' in them fail to show in directory listing, e.g. "New
Folder%".  They also cannot be accessed via URL.

They show up and are accessible in 1.3.x series.
creator: senior_banana@yahoo.com

text:
I believe Andre fixed this a while back.  I've tested and confirmed that 2.1
doesn't exibit this bug, but 2.0 does.
creator: dpejesh@yahoo.com

text: Fxed and waiting for backport, so I'm closing this one.
